TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Queue extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ICloneable
Public Class Queue Implements ICloneable, ICollection
public ref class Queue : ICloneable, System::Collections::ICollection
type Queue = class interface ICollection interface ICloneable interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示物件的先進先出 (FIFO) 集合。

span.span: Represents a first-in, first-out collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作佇列，以循環的陣列。This class implements a queue as a circular array. 物件儲存在其中一端插入和移除其他。Objects stored in a are inserted at one end and removed from the other. 佇列和堆疊時很有用的資訊; 需暫存儲存體也就是當您可能想要擷取其值之後捨棄項目。Queues and stacks are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 使用如果您需要存取相同的順序，將它儲存在集合中的資訊。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 使用如果您要以相反順序存取的資訊。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 使用或如果您需要從多個執行緒同時存取集合。Use or if you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 三個主要的作業可對和其項目：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 將項目加入至結尾。 adds an element to the end of the . - 從開頭移除最舊的項目。 removes the oldest element from the start of the . - 傳回最舊的項目，是在開頭但不會移除從。 returns the oldest element that is at the start of the but does not remove it from the . 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 成長因子是需要更大的容量時，目前的容量相乘的數字。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 等比級數因數會決定當建構。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 預設的成長因子為 2.0。The default growth factor is 2.0. 容量至少至少四個，不論等比級數因數一定會增加。The capacity of the will always increase by at least a minimum of four, regardless of the growth factor. 比方說，含成長因子的 1.0 將永遠增加容量中四個需要更大的容量時。For example, a with a growth factor of 1.0 will always increase in capacity by four when a greater capacity is required. 接受`null`做為有效的值，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. 此集合的泛型版本，請參閱 For the generic version of this collection, see ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立及新增值以以及如何列印出其值。The following example shows how to create and add values to a and how to print out its values. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是設為零，並且從項目集合中的其他物件的參考也釋出。 is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 容量會維持不變。The capacity remains unchanged. 若要重設的容量，呼叫。To reset the capacity of the , call . 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何清除的值。The following example shows how to clear the values of the . summary.span: 建立 的淺層複本。

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不論它們是參考型別或實值型別，但是它不會複製參考所參考的物件集合的元素複製集合的淺層複本。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新的集合中的參考會指向相同原始集合中的參考所指向的物件。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 相反地，項目複製集合的深層複本，並直接或間接參考的元素，所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling . 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件並上的方法`obj`來判斷是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `obj` to determine whether `item` exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷並方法`obj`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `obj` parameter on the objects in the collection.

The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 營運是的項目數，可以儲存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can store. 是實際的項目數。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 營運永遠是大於或等於。The capacity of a is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過容量加入元素時，會自動將舊的項目複製並加入新項目之前，重新配置內部陣列增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 新的處理能力取決於目前的容量乘以成長因子，也就是決定何時建構。The new capacity is determined by multiplying the current capacity by the growth factor, which is determined when the is constructed. 營運一定會增加的最小的值，不論等比級數因數，為 1.0 的成長因子也不會阻止從增加的大小。The capacity of the will always increase by a minimum value, regardless of the growth factor; a growth factor of 1.0 will not prevent the from increasing in size. 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 成長因子是需要更大的容量時，目前的容量相乘的數字。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 等比級數因數會決定當建構。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 營運一定會增加的最小的值，不論等比級數因數，為 1.0 的成長因子也不會阻止從增加的大小。The capacity of the will always increase by a minimum value, regardless of the growth factor; a growth factor of 1.0 will not prevent the from increasing in size. 如果小於比內部陣列的容量，這個方法是 o （1） 作業。If is less than the capacity of the internal array, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果內部陣列需要重新配置以便容納新的項目，這個方法會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the internal array needs to be reallocated to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入項目來，移除項目，從，或檢視之項目的開頭。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the beginning of the . An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保證的執行緒安全，所有作業都必須都透過包裝函式所傳回方法。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何同步處理，判斷是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns the object at the beginning of the without removing it.
The object at the beginning of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法與 方法類似，但是 不會修改 。This method is similar to the method, but does not modify the . `null` 可以加入至做為值。`null` can be added to the as a value. 區別 null 值，而結尾，檢查屬性或 catch ，它就會擲回時是空的。To distinguish between a null value and the end of the , check the property or catch the , which is thrown when the is empty. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何加入項目來，移除項目，從，或檢視之項目的開頭。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the beginning of the . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回包裝原始佇列並且為安全執行緒的新 。

span.span: Returns a new that wraps the original queue, and is thread safe.

returns.span: 同步 (安全執行緒) 的 包裝函式。

span.span: A wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的包裝函式會鎖定佇列之前，讓它安全執行緒的方式執行，執行作業。The wrapper returned by this method locks the queue before an operation is performed so that it is performed in a thread-safe manner. 若要保證的執行緒安全，必須透過此包裝函式只完成所有作業。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through this wrapper only. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何同步處理，判斷是否同步處理，並使用 同步處理。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的同步處理的版本，使用方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 不過，在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的中，不要直接依賴。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)]

summary.span: 將 項目複製到新的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements to a new array.

returns.span: 新的陣列，包含複製自 的元素。

span.span: A new array containing elements copied from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 則不會修改。The is not modified. 新陣列中項目的順序是從開頭項目的順序相同至它的結尾。The order of the elements in the new array is the same as the order of the elements from the beginning of the to its end. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將複製到一維陣列。The following example shows how to copy a into a one-dimensional array. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將容量設為 中的實際項目數目。

span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來最小化佇列的記憶體額外負荷如果沒有新的項目會新增至佇列。This method can be used to minimize a queue's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the queue. 若要重設設為初始狀態，呼叫方法之前呼叫。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling . 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: The is read-only.
